ill keep old review at top, new one is below.

i dont understand why i even bother anymore, the only way to win is to be an amazing nurse or tunnel, you will be bullied to the ends of the earth by survivors, dstrike here, flashlight there, brand new part everyhere else, if you dont run hex ruin you wont get past rank 15, and even in some cases the whole perk is gone in 30 seconds at begining of game. Survivors hold all the power in their hands, they control the game completley, i dont have the time or patience to be like truetalent, most killers dont, and its annoying to always have to play so opimally that if you miss anything or get pallet stunned everyone gets away. Im convinced the devs have never been past rank 15, idk how this can be called "fun". I guess if you wanna just be a survivor main this is the game for you, if you wanna play killer i'd avoid this title. There is no fun left just bashing your face into a wall over and over till your brain goes numb.

So ive put on many more hours as both survivor and killer, the game state has improved a TON. but a recent nerf to a perk called Hex:Ruin has made the game way faster, so fast that it can be hard to hook more than 3 survivors on most killers. nurse and hillbilly are still the gods of the game, i hate playing both. ill update again if more patches come out to fix some of this crap. still cant reccomend if you wanna be killer, if you wanna be a survivor this is your game.

5 STARS

I Quit this game long time ago and forgot to give my reviews on this game.
when this game launch, theres a massive glitch,bugs,exploit and progression issues within the game.i give it sometimes and hope they improved the game. And 1 time, i lost my progression when all my character goes back to level 0, waited for 1month to get back my progression just because of some blind tards in the studio dint get my email.
Secondly is the gameplay and mechanics.They havent fix the face camping.Infinites is still around.Yet they implement bloodlust when the killer is already faster than the survivors...seriously Devs Behaviour , u call that balance ? thats the last straw for me playing the game
And lastly, its too RNG,GRINDY and REPETITIVE. Get into a game,repair Generator,juke killer,open gate and escape. Get into Menu screen,Spend your bloodpoints and HOPE  you dont get trash perks. Thats all you do in this game. Have FUN playing Gen Simulator. 
What did the devs do next ? Develop a new game called "Deathgarden" WHICH the goal of the game is almost identical to DBD, just change it into generic shooting mechanic and WALA a brand "NEW" game. 
I highly not recommend you buy game from this developer,waste of time+save your money

一款非常有意思的生存类游戏，一个屠夫个四个人类的对抗，人类修满5个电机逃离再循环，屠夫虐杀人类满足邪灵。虽然玩了很久，但是还会感受到一丝的恐惧

Игра не для обычных смертных, только для тех у кого есть 3 друга (если за выживших) и куча времени, если нет то простите вы будете проигрывать всегда(если лох не попадется) ибо если за маньяка вам попадется тима из 4 человек вы максимум убьете 1 и все, а если уж за выживших 1 то все прощайте, вы умрете либо вас закемперят, либо вас подставят свои, или же вам попадется смурфик, БАЛАНСА НЕТ. 3 обдолбаных Бубы из 10.

2018 Review (20ish Hours): Very fun to play with friends, haven't really played alone yet so can't vouch for it there. But for $10 on the Steam summer sale, and getting a few friends to play along it has been a very fun experience. It's laid back, and not as competitive as our normal gaming nights. Get spoopy!



Updated 2021 Review (200+ Hours): So after playing about 200 more hours than my earlier review I would still recommend this game because it is very fun, but I will add that my old review was completely wrong lol. Once you start leveling up and ranking up the game's become much more difficult, metas have changed and constantly change, the players are toxic and it is VERY competitive like I really missed the mark on that one. There are so many perks and builds to fit specific play-styles, items, mechanics like looping with a variety of players that are good at different ones. This game will be either very fun at times or very frustrating it still has many buggy moments, bad hit detection at times, etc. But it isn't a $60 dollar game and they do constantly update it and take in feedback and update the community consistently unlike many developers.  Note that survivors play in 3rd person and killers play in 1st person. A lot of the survivors and killers all have teachable perks you level up to unlock for other playable characters, but this will require buying said Survivor or Killer in the Steam Store. If you want the perks without spending money you can get the teachable perks in the Shrine of Secrets with Iridescent Shards you get from leveling up. The Shrine refreshes 4 different teachable perks every week. The game will need a lot of play time to get blood-points to level up characters and get the perks you want once you get the unlockable teachable perks they will pop up on other characters skill trees, but you can't just choose them they randomly show up as you level. So it will be a grind to finally make the exact build you want for one character. 


Is this game for you? Well that all depends on your play-style. 



(With Friends) If you have friends that play you will have fun learning and playing as survivor with them, this game sets up a lot of fun moments to either troll or dominate with your friends. You can coordinate with them for body blocks, pallet stuns, block hooks, flashlight saves, flashlight blinds off a pallet stun, locker jump out stuns and just so many other things. You can get really sweaty if you want to be. This will take a lot of time and learning but there are tons of survivors with different perks you can read and find out which you would like to play best, you can always get character specific perks for other characters later on and then the survivors basically just become a skin and you play them however you want. 

If you have to many friends you can just do custom lobbies and switch who plays killer which can be really fun and practice as well. 



(Solo Survivor) If you expect top-tier game play as a solo player playing survivor you aren't gonna get it, the lack of communication and perks of random players can make it difficult to coordinate sometimes, is it impossible to win? No. But a lot more difficult depending on how well-rounded your team is. The inconsistent matchmaking at times does not make this any better. But if you like a challenge and don't get annoyed easily and can accept losing and bad teammates every once in a while you won't have a problem with it. If you rage easily though I would not recommend solo survivor.



(Killer - Obviously Solo) This is the true lone wolf, solo player experience. You have a multitude of killers to choose from all with unique powers and perks, it will probably take some time to find out what fits your play-style best or who you have the most fun with. You're gonna have to buy most of them so I recommend looking up videos of each killer and seeing what they do and how they play to see if they are what you would be interested in, you don't wanna just spend a lot of money on them all if you end up not liking the game later on down the road. You will have very rough matches starting out, if you actually play new players the games will be pretty even, but the 13th of every month ranks reset so lots of returning players or veterans will be matched with you every so often. You will have sweaty full group survivors trolling or destroying you and then sometimes you may absolutely wipe the floor with a team. As you play you will learn and strive to become better so you don't get demolished by a team. 



All in all I do still recommend this game, it was a fun game for me when I played it casually and it is still a fun game playing it more seriously now. Just do some research on the game before deciding on it, because it does require a bit of money to actually experience the full game but also totally optional.

杀机真不愧是好作品，两年了百玩不厌。官方一定要惩罚拔线，或者只让拔线玩家互相匹配，或者让其他玩家知道这个玩家爱拔线，拔线是这个游戏最大的问题。
照顾人类干什么？哪张地图我也就不说了80%的格挡和弯路玩你麻痹的黎明杀机？官方帮人类可以可以差评拿好不送玩个屁的电锯鬼啊！没脑子出什么新地图？！看地图你倒是告诉我下一把会是什么地图呀。你们说了吗？屠夫就是要比人类强才好玩不然我们玩屠夫干什么？

90% of the killers are joke characters who have no agency against survivors running halfway decent perks. The best killers gives no or little agency to survivors. I'll install this game for a bit then have shitty games like that reminding me that the optimal playstyle is to be avoidant of interaction with the opposing side. You'll chase someone from 1 tile at 5 gens thats linked into 3 other strong tiles and by the time you catch them you'll have lost 3 gens. The only thing that makes the game bearable is the matchmaking system is terrible enough to throw you the opposite direction against players who don't have as much an idea how to play.

This game can be fun but it is nothing close to good.

To be honest i hate this state of dbd right now where they just keep releasing new skins instead of fixing their game with so many game breaking bugs and when they said they want to focus on bigger event like the anniversary event im hoping for something new or a similar points mechanic like the mini events couple years back but instead they give us the same copy paste from the last anniversary but with "new crowns" and cakes its dissapointing really. 

The older dbd was much much much better with fast hotfix for known bugs and mini event like blight event, bbq event, lunar event, etc. It seems that they just doesnt care anymore about this game and only focused on collaboration and filling their pockets by releasing some ugly skins. I know you all been working hard on this game but please at least listen to your community feedback about the game. I hope you guys can focus more on the game rather than skins thats all, wish you all the best for future updates cheers.

I even tolerated the loss of progress months ago (so I started the game again), but this 2.0 is just horrible. Buy it only if you've glitches/bugs fetishes. Broken game, most of the exp. players have left time ago. That's all.

Edit: now the game is even worse, even less pallets, finding matches as killer is impossible since everone wants to play as it, due to the extreme nerfs to survivor.
